column6: Reed's got a rendezvous to keep at the edge of space-but in order to reach it, he's going to have to work his way through a battalion of America's best-trained fighting men!
column8: | penciller (cover):Jim Calafiore | penciller (cover):Mike McKone | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Andy Lanning | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Paul Mounts
